languages.text: "Легенды этого племени гласят, что некогда первый из Звездорожденных спустился на сей мир вместе с предками этой правительницы и создал древние города и храмы, и принес благо Бога-орла в эти леса и земли. Быстротечное время стерло имя Звездорожденного из памяти предков этого племени. И остался лишь титул — Кетца Темер — Первый-из-Избранных, посланец Бога-орла и Отец племен".

traits.locale_text: "Легенды этого племени гласят, что некогда первый из Звездорожденных спустился на сей мир вместе с предками этой правительницы и создал древние города и храмы, и принес благо Бога-орла в эти леса и земли. Быстротечное время стерло имя Звездорожденного из памяти предков этого племени. И остался лишь титул — Кетца-аль Хет — Первый-из-Избранных, посланец Бога-орла и Отец племен".

languages.text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."
languages.original_text: "Легенды этого племени гласят, что некогда первый из Звездорожденных спустился на сей мир вместе с предками этой правительницы и создал древние города и храмы, и принес благо Бога-орла в эти леса и земли. Быстротечное время стерло имя Звездорожденного из памяти предков этого племени. И остался лишь титул — Кетца Темер — Первый-из-Избранных, посланец Бога-орла и Отец племен".

traits.locale_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, one of the Starborn had descended upon this world together with this ruler's descendants, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the good of the God-Eagle into these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time had erased the Starborn name from the minds of the people. Only his title had been left — Quetza Temer — The First of the Chosen, the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God and the Father of the tribe."

"The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, one of the Starborn had descended upon this world together with this ruler's descendants, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the good of the God-Eagle into these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time had erased the Starborn name from the minds of the people. Only his title had been left — Quetza Temer — The First of the Chosen, the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God and the Father of the tribe."

The fast-flowing time had erased the Starborn name from the minds of the people. Only his title had been left — Quetza Temer — The First of the Chosen, the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God and the Father of the tribe."

The fast-flowing time had erased the Starborn name from the minds of the people. Only his title had been left — Quetza Temer — The First of the Chosen, the Heavenly Envoy of the Eagle-God and the Father of the tribe."

"The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

"The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

languages.text: «Cuentan nuestras leyendas que, hace mucho tiempo, el primer Hijo de las Estrellas descendió a este mundo junto con los antepasados de esta jefa, erigió las antiguas ciudades y templos, y extendió la buena obra del Dios Águila por estos bosques y campos. El tiempo ha borrado el nombre de aquel Hijo de las Estrellas de las mentes de su pueblo. Tan solo se recuerda su título: Quetza Temer, el Primero de los Elegidos, el Emisario Celestial del Dios Águila y Padre de las Tribus».
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

traits.locale_text: «Cuentan nuestras leyendas que, hace mucho tiempo, un Hijo de las Estrellas descendió a este mundo junto con los antepasados de esta jefa, erigió las antiguas ciudades y templos, y extendió la buena obra del Dios Águila por estos bosques y campos. El tiempo pasó deprisa y borró el nombre de aquel Hijo de las Estrellas de las mentes de su pueblo. Tan solo se recuerda su título: Quetza Temer, el Primero de los Elegidos, el Emisario Celestial del Dios Águila y Padre de la tribu».

languages.text: “这片土地有个传说。很久以前，一位星裔与此酋长的先人一同降临在这个世界上，建造了古老的城市和神庙，将鹰神的恩泽播撒到森林和土地上。时光飞逝，那位星裔的名字已被遗忘，只剩下他的头衔还映在人们的脑中。人们至今称他为格扎尔特默，第一神选者，鹰神的圣使，部落之父。”
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

traits.locale_text: “这片土地有个传说。很久以前，一位星裔与此酋长的先人一同降临在这个世界上，建造了古老的城市和神庙，将鹰神的恩泽播撒到森林和土地上。时光飞逝，那位星裔的名字已被遗忘，只剩下他的头衔还映在人们的脑中。人们至今称他为格扎尔特默，第一神选者，鹰神的天使，部落之父。”

languages.text: « La légende raconte qu'il y a bien longtemps, un premier Stellaire est venu sur ce monde, accompagné des ancêtres de cette dirigeante. Il y a bâti les temples et les cités d'antan, tout en apportant la bénédiction de l'Aigle-Dieu sur ces terres et ces forêts. La marche rapide du temps a effacé le nom de ce Stellaire de la mémoire des gens ; seul son titre a subsisté : Quetza Temer, premier des élus, émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu et père des tribus. »
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

traits.locale_text: « La légende raconte qu'il y a bien longtemps, un Stellaire est venu sur ce monde, accompagné des ancêtres de cette dirigeante. Il y a bâti les temples et les cités d'antan, tout en apportant la bénédiction de l'Aigle-Dieu sur ces terres et ces forêts. La marche rapide du temps a effacé le nom de ce Stellaire de la mémoire des gens ; seul son titre a subsisté : Quetza Temer, premier des élus, émissaire céleste de l'Aigle-Dieu et père de la tribu. »

languages.text: 「この地に伝わる伝説によると、はるか昔、最初のスターボーンの一人がこの支配者の先祖とともにこの世界に降り立ち、古代の都市や神殿を作り、鷲神の善をこの森と土地にもたらしたという。疾き時の流れは、人々の心からスターボーンの名を消し去りました。そして、残されたのは彼の称号…ケツァ・テメルのみ。最初の選ばれし者の一人にして、鷲神の天の先駆者、そして部族の父なり」
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

traits.locale_text: 「この地に伝わる伝説によると、はるか昔、最初のスターボーンの一人がこの支配者の先祖とともにこの世界に降り立ち、古代の都市や神殿を作り、鷲神の善をこの森と土地にもたらしたという。疾き時の流れは、人々の心からスターボーンの名を消し去りました。そして、残されたのは彼の称号…ケツァ・テメルのみ。最初の選ばれし者の一人にして、鷲神の天の先駆者、そして部族の父なり」

languages.text: "Den örtlichen Legenden zufolge ist vor langer Zeit der Erste der Sternengeborenen gemeinsam mit den Vorfahren dieser Herrscherin auf diese Welt herabgestiegen, hat die uralten Städte und Tempel errichtet und den Segen des Adler-Gottes in diese Wälder und Lande gebracht. Die schnell fließende Zeit hat den Namen des Sternengeborenen aus den Köpfen der Leute gespült. Nur sein Titel ist geblieben: Quetza Temer, der Erste der Auserwählten, der Himmel-Herold des Adler-Gottes und der Vater der Stämme."
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."

traits.locale_text: "Den örtlichen Legenden zufolge ist vor langer Zeit einer der Sternengeborenen gemeinsam mit den Vorfahren dieser Herrscherin auf diese Welt herabgestiegen, hat die uralten Städte und Tempel errichtet und das Gute des Gott-Adlers in diese Wälder und Lande gebracht. Die schnell fließende Zeit hat den Namen des Sternengeborenen aus den Köpfen der Leute gespült. Nur sein Titel ist geblieben: Quetza Temer, der Erste der Auserwählten, der himmlische Gesandte des Adler-Gottes und der Vater des Stamms."

languages.text: "Buraya ait efsaneler; çok uzun vakitler önce ilk Yıldızdoğan'ın bu hükümdarın atalarıyla birlikte bu dünyaya indiğini, kadim şehirlerle tapınaklar inşa ettiğini ve Kartal Tanrı'nın lütfunu bu ormanlarla topraklara getirdiğini iddia eder. Hızla akıp giden yıllar içinde Yıldızdoğan'ın ismi, halkların zihinlerinden silinmiş. Akıllarda kalan, yalnızca ünvanı olmuş: Seçilenlerin İlki, Kartal Tanrı'nın Gök Müjdecisi ve Kabilelerin Babası Quetza Temer."
languages.original_text: "The legends of this place claim that a long time ago, the first among the Starborn descended upon this world together with this ruler's ancestors, created the ancient cities and temples, and brought the blessing of the Eagle-God unto these forests and lands. The fast-flowing time has erased the Starborn's name from the minds of the people. Only his title remains — Quetza Temer, the First of the Chosen, the Sky-Herald of the Eagle-God, and the Father of Tribes."
